item.title: Canada Host 4 network issues
item.content:encoded:
2021-03-12T12:11:25.268Z
Resolved

All services are online again. OVH confirmed that the server was inaccessible from the network due to a network issue.

Task was: http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=49523

2021-03-11T21:11:25.268Z
Identified

Host 4 started to show significant packet loss. After a reboot, it does not come online again. Hard reboot times out. IPMI times out. An OVH technician is already working on the rack.

item.title: Fire in Strasbourg, France Data Center
item.content:encoded:
2021-03-12T20:11:25.268Z
Update

OVH will take several weeks or more to bring the services in Strasbourg online again.

We have ordered new servers in Roubaix to temporarily restore all affected customers servers there. Sadly there is also no ETA for deliveries in Roubaix, but it should be around 15th March.

2021-03-10T01:47:58.454Z
Identified

OVH Announcement: We are currently facing a major incident in our DataCenter of Strasbourg. If your production is in Strasbourg, we recommend to activate your Disaster Recovery Plan.

Detailed information http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=49484
